articles.title: Why Climate Change is Driving Some to Skip Having Kids - UANews
articles.description: A new study finds that overconsumption, overpopulation and uncertainty about the future are among the top concerns of those who say climate change is affecting their reproductive decision-making.
articles.content:
By Alexis Blue,
